data.message:
Eminem :)
Please Bring the real slim shady again :) 
You are making awful songs now a days :/ 
The Rap is made just for you :) 
Without you Rap would be nothing... 
So come along like you were in the past but don't do drugs...
And don't give a fuck about Illuminati ;) 
You're signed with Illuminati so, you can't get out ... 
So, please do it just for us :) 
Make songs like the last decade :) 
This is my wish :) 
I hope you read this text :) 
May The Real Slim Shady control you.... 
Peace !!! =D
